page.description: Flush contents of file to disk.
page.discussion: The <FILE>.FLUSH() method flushes output held in the disk cache, to assure all output is stored safely in the file referenced by the object pointer <FILE> before the file is closed.
page.example: text = ui_get_text("Text", "Enter text:", "Value") file_pointer = file.create("c:\a5\flush.txt", FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE) for i = 1 TO 50 file_pointer.write(text) next i file_pointer.flush()'write any buffered text to disk file_pointer.close()
